title: "Purdue researchers uncover blind spots at the intersection of AI and neuroscience"
excerpt: "Is it possible to read a person's mind by analyzing the electric signals from the brain? The answer may be much more complex than most people think. Purdue University researchers - working at the intersection of artificial intelligence and neuroscience - say a prominent dataset used to try to answer this question is confounded,"
